TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DataGridViewLinkCell extends System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell

summary.span: 表示包含链接的单元格。

span.span: Represents a cell that contains a link.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类是用于显示链接的专用 类型。The class is a specialized type of used to display links. 是专用于保存此类型的单元格的列类型。The is the column type specialized to hold cells of this type. 默认情况下， 初始化为新的 。By default, the is initialized to a new . 若要在现有 之后对列中的单元格进行样式设置，请将列的 属性设置为要用作模式的单元格。To pattern the cells within a column after an existing , set the column's property to the cell to use as a pattern. 此列的单元格相关属性是模板单元的名称相同的属性的包装。The cell-related properties of the column are wrappers for the similarly-named properties of the template cell. 更改模板单元的属性值将仅影响基于更改后添加的模板的单元格。Changing the property values of the template cell will affect only cells based on the template that are added after the change. 但是，更改列的单元格相关属性值将更新列中的模板单元和所有其他单元，并在必要时刷新列显示。Changing the cell-related property values of the column, however, will update the template cell and all other cells in the column, and refresh the column display if necessary. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 作为 的模板。The following code example demonstrates how to use a as a template for a . 对列中的任何单元格所做的样式更改都将影响列的所有单元格。Style changes made to any cell in the column affect all of the column's cells. 此代码示例是为 类提供的更大示例的一部分。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos#120](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos/CPP/DataGridViewColumnDemo.cpp#120)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos#120](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos/CS/DataGridViewColumnDemo.cs#120)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos#120](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos/VB/datagridviewcolumndemo.vb#120)]

para.span: 当从 派生并向派生类添加新属性时，请确保重写 方法，以便在克隆操作过程中复制新属性。

span.span: When you derive from and add new properties to the derived class, be sure to override the method to copy the new properties during cloning operations.

para.span: 还应调用基类的 方法，以便将基类的属性复制到新单元。

span.span: You should also call the base class's method so that the properties of the base class are copied to the new cell.

summary.span: 获取或设置用来显示活动链接的颜色。

span.span: Gets or sets the color used to display an active link.

value.span: ，表示用于显示选定的链接的颜色。

span.span: A that represents the color used to display a link that is being selected.

value.span: 默认值为用户的 Internet Explorer 中对链接处于悬停状态时的颜色设置。

span.span: The default value is the user's Internet Explorer setting for the color of links in the hover state.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置所属列的 属性还会设置列中每个单元格的 属性并刷新列显示。Setting the property of the owning column also sets the property of every cell in the column and refreshes the column display. 若要覆盖单个单元的指定值，请在设置列值后设置单元值。To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性，该属性类似于此属性。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property, which is similar to this property. 此示例是 类概述主题中提供的一个更大示例的一部分。This example is part of a larger example available in the class overview topic. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#70](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/CPP/employees.cpp#70)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#70](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/CS/employees.cs#70)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#70](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/VB/employees.vb#70)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每当从 派生并将新属性添加到派生类时，重写 方法。Override the method whenever you derive from and add new properties to the derived class.

para.span: 当在派生类中重写 时，调用基类的 方法，以便将基类的属性复制到新的单元格，并确保还复制已添加到派生类的任何属性的值。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, call the base class's method so that the properties of the base class are copied to the new cell, and be sure to also copy the values of any properties that were added to the derived class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 之前调用。 is called just before . 如果对 的调用具有取消共享包含该单元格的行的效果，则该方法必须返回 `true`。It must return `true` if the call to has the effect of unsharing the row containing the cell. 否则应返回 `false`。It should return `false` otherwise. 有关行共享的详细信息，请参阅[缩放 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件的最佳做法](/dotnet/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control)。For more information about row sharing, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](/dotnet/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control).

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Forms::LinkBehavior LinkBehavior { System::Windows::Forms::LinkBehavior get(); void set(System::Windows::Forms::LinkBehavior value); };
member this.LinkBehavior : System.Windows.Forms.LinkBehavior with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值表示链接的行为。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that represents the behavior of a link.
One of the values.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 链接行为的示例包括链接是否始终显示下划线，或在鼠标指针移到链接上时是否仅显示下划线; 双击或单击一次就会激活链接。Examples of link behavior include whether the link always displays an underline or the link only displays an underline when the mouse pointer moves over it, and whether a double click or a single click activates a link. 设置所属列的 属性还会设置列中每个单元格的 属性并刷新列显示。Setting the property of the owning column also sets the property of every cell in the column and refreshes the column display. 若要覆盖单个单元的指定值，请在设置列值后设置单元值。To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性，该属性类似于此属性。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property, which is similar to this property. 此示例是 类概述主题中提供的一个更大示例的一部分。This example is part of a larger example available in the class overview topic. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#70](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/CPP/employees.cpp#70)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#70](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/CS/employees.cs#70)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#70](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/VB/employees.vb#70)]

exception.span: 当设置此属性时，指定的值不是有效的 值。

span.span: The specified value when setting this property is not a valid value.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否访问过此链接。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the link was visited.

value.span: 如果已经访问过该链接，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the link has been visited; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性设置为 `true`时，访问该链接时，将自动设置 属性。When the property is set to `true`, the property is automatically set when the link is visited. 如果通过使用鼠标或键盘选中链接来激活链接，则访问该链接。A link is visited if it has been activated by selecting it with the mouse or keyboard.

span.span: Indicates whether the row containing the cell will be unshared when the mouse button is released while the pointer is over the cell.

returns.span: 如果鼠标指针在链接上，则为 ；否则为 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 之前调用。 is called just before . 如果对 的调用具有取消共享包含该单元格的行的效果，则该方法必须返回 `true`。It must return `true` if the call to has the effect of unsharing the row containing the cell. 否则应返回 `false`。It should return `false` otherwise. 有关行共享的详细信息，请参阅[缩放 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件的最佳做法](/dotnet/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control)。For more information about row sharing, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](/dotnet/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control).

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool TrackVisitedState { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.TrackVisitedState : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示链接被访问后，其颜色是否改变。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the link changes color when it is visited.

value.span: 如果在选中链接时，该链接更改颜色，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the link changes color when it is selected; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当 `false`时， 属性不会在访问时自动设置为 `true`。When `false`, the property will not be automatically set to `true` when visited. 设置所属列的 属性还会设置列中每个单元格的 属性并刷新列显示。Setting the property of the owning column also sets the property of every cell in the column and refreshes the column display. 若要覆盖单个单元的指定值，请在设置列值后设置单元值。To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性，该属性类似于此属性。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property, which is similar to this property. 此示例是 类概述主题中提供的一个更大示例的一部分。This example is part of a larger example available in the class overview topic. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#70](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/CPP/employees.cpp#70)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#70](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/CS/employees.cs#70)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#70](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/VB/employees.vb#70)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool UseColumnTextForLinkValue { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.UseColumnTextForLinkValue : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示列 属性值是否显示为链接文本。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the column property value is displayed as the link text.

value.span: 如果列的 属性值显示为链接文本，则为 ；如果单元格的 属性值显示为链接文本，则为 。

span.span: if the column property value is displayed as the link text; if the cell property value is displayed as the link text.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置所属列的 属性还会设置列中每个单元格的 属性并刷新列显示。Setting the property of the owning column also sets the property of every cell in the column and refreshes the column display. 若要覆盖单个单元的指定值，请在设置列值后设置单元值。To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性，该属性类似于此属性。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property, which is similar to this property. 此示例是 类概述主题中提供的一个更大示例的一部分。This example is part of a larger example available in the class overview topic. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#70](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/CPP/employees.cpp#70)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#70](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/CS/employees.cs#70)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#70](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/VB/employees.vb#70)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Drawing::Color VisitedLinkColor { System::Drawing::Color get(); void set(System::Drawing::Color value); };
member this.VisitedLinkColor : System.Drawing.Color with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置用于显示以前访问过的链接的颜色。

span.span: Gets or sets the color used to display a link that has been previously visited.

value.span: ，表示用来显示已访问过的链接的颜色。

span.span: A that represents the color used to display a link that has been visited.

value.span: 默认值为用户的 Internet Explorer 中对已访问过的链接的颜色设置。

span.span: The default value is the user's Internet Explorer setting for the visited link color.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置所属列的 属性还会设置列中每个单元格的 属性并刷新列显示。Setting the property of the owning column also sets the property of every cell in the column and refreshes the column display. 若要覆盖单个单元的指定值，请在设置列值后设置单元值。To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性，该属性类似于此属性。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property, which is similar to this property. 此示例是 类概述主题中提供的一个更大示例的一部分。This example is part of a larger example available in the class overview topic. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#70](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/CPP/employees.cpp#70)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#70](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/CS/employees.cs#70)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#70](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/VB/employees.vb#70)]
